overview: Jon Dough’s sexual performances have earned him more awards than he can remember. Now he’s trying a new position behind the camera. Attitude marks the directorial debut of one of the brightest talents in the business as well as a cast of some of the hottest, newest names around. The story takes place in a seemingly ordinary bar. But what happens there is anything but ordinary. Check it out for yourself and order a double.
tagline: If you've got it, flaunt it.
title: Attitude
